import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, FormGroup, Col, Input, Label, Button, Container, CardBody, Card, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import '../../App.css' import '../../index.css' const StudentSignup = () => { const [firstname, setFirstName] = useState("") const [lastname, setLastName] = useState("") const [dateofbirth, setDOB] = useState("") const [schoolprogram, setSchoolProgram] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const formSubmit = async event => { event.preventDefault() console.log('ready to hit expressApp') const response = await fetch('http://localhost:4000/contact_forms/entries', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({firstname, lastname, dateofbirth, schoolprogram, email, password}) }) /* const response = await fetch('http://google.ca', { method: 'GET', headers: null, body: null }) */ console.log('finish fetch call') const payload = await response.json() console.log('response code is' + response.status) if (response.status >= 400) { alert(`Oops! Error: ${payload.message} for fields: ${payload.invalid.join(",")}`) } else { alert(`Congrats! Submission submitted with id: ${payload.id}`) setFirstName("") setLastName("") setDOB("") setSchoolProgram("") setEmail("") setPassword("") } } return ( {/* */}
